name: Sheet Music Treble Game
description:
Learn how to read sheet music.

Whether you're an expert musician or a beginner you'll enjoy learning and improving your sheet music reading skills while playing this game.

The easy level of game play only displays one octave of notes.
The medium level lets you play two octaves.
The expert level has three octaves.

You'll have sixty seconds to recognize as many of the notes displayed correctly as you can. Professional musicians regularly get more than 70 correct answer in the expert level. Can you match them?

For extra fun: challenge your friends to beat your score.

Additional features:
- Practice mode
- Reverse game mode
- Sound selection
- Set a daily reminder
- Includes Apple Watch game

Enjoy improving your music skills.



Visit WWW.BIDBOX.COM for more great apps

**********************************************************
WE SUPPORT TEACHERS: If you're a music teacher simply send an email to apps@bidbox.com with the subject line "iPad Treble Pro" and a short description of where you teach to get a redemption code for this game.
**********************************************************
